label: Allergy
comment: A guest condition of the abnormal reaction of the body to a previously encountered substance introduced by inhalation, ingestion, injection, or skin contact.

objectProperties.comment: A textual description of this guest allergy.
A name, expressed as text, of this guest allergy.
A restriction, expressed as text, related to this guest allergy.
The code specifying the type of guest allergy.

referencedBy.comment: An allergy notified for this guest person.
